channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - October 23, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-october-23-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week (with the added bonus of last weekend's Gauntlet Community Open Gaming!) we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Apocalypse Keys_ * _Autumn Triduum_ * _Back Again from the Broken Land_ * _Better the Villain Who Serves You_ * _Bounty of the Week_ * _Brindlewood Bay_ * _Checkpoint Midnight_ * _Cortex Prime_ * _Eotenweard_ * _Fate of Cthulhu_ * _Good Society_ * _Grand Guignol_ * _Impulse Drive_ * _Love by the Quarter Mile_ * _Lovecraftesque_ * _Marvel Heroic_ * _Masks_ * _Midnight at the Oasis_ * _Monster of the Week_ * _My Partner the Ghost_ * _Mörk Borg_ * _Offworlders_ * _Projekt Dark Prometheus_ * _Swords of the Serpentine_ * _The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea_ * _The Pack_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_ * _World of Gamma_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - October 23, 2020
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week (with the added bonus of last weekend’s Gauntlet Community Open Gaming!) we’ve got sessions of these great games:

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Hangouts category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar to play!
